description:
Osprey’s Airporter Backpack Travel Cover is designed shield your pack from unnecessary damage incurred during transit. Lockable zippers provide an extra layer of security for your gear when you’re on the road.

  • Made of lightweight yet durable 210-denier nylon ripstop fabric
  • Large lockable zipper protects your belongings during transit
  • Stow away shoulder strap for comfortable carrying through airports and bus terminals
  • Top and side grab handle for easy handling
  • ID card window helps the bag find its way home again if it gets lost in transit
  • Size medium designed for packs 45 - 75 liters
  • Size large designed for packs 70 - 110 liters
name: Osprey Airporter Backpack Cover
